Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and pink-grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393787) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393787)
